availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Savage (Mason County, Kentucky, retail clerk and attorney)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, retail clerk and attorney. Kentucky native. Son of F. A. Savage. Married to Martha Miller Savage in Bourbon County, Kentucky, on March 13, 1860. Father of Frank Savage and Walter R. Savage. Clerk in Howard County, Missouri, in 1850. Attorney in Mason County, Kentucky, in 1860. Attorney in Mason County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Missouri, Howard County, p. 192A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 335.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, MT Sterling, p. 380D.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bourbon County Marriages, Film #000183089.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994048, Mason County Births.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Mason County, KY, September 1863.
